title: Patch Notes
content:
Optimised fog rendering when Fog Quality is set to Low. Optimised the combat AI. Improved performance related to in-game lights. Improved the Discord rich presence by adding things like in-game location and the ability to request to join the game. Optimised terrain shaders. Improved some sluggish performance when navigating through the radial menus on controller. Improved potential performance dips related to switching between keyboard and mouse input and controller input.
